Narrations.Narration: Dip the bicycle as per previous
instructions.
Attach rear and front wheels to frame.
Attach drive train to assembly and grease.
Fit handle bar assembly and attach brake
system to frame.
Ride bicycle through inspection obstacle
course.
Wash and cool-dry bicycles coming from
inspection.

Component.LevelErrorMessage: The maximum number of 15 levels has been exceeded

Narrations.Narration: Attach stem to head tube. Fit handle bar
frame. Fix brake assembly to handle bars
and seal with brake hoods. Attach rubber
grips and leave to dry.
Fit front cable to front cantilever
assembly. Fit rear cable to rear cantilever
assembly.
Drill flange to accommodate 24 spokes.
Assemble flange and ball bearings and quick
release lever.
Drill rim to accommodate 24 spokes.
Attach spokes to rim and hub. Fit tube and
tire.
Drill flange to accommodate 24 spokes.
Assemble flange and ball bearings and quick
release lever.
Drill rim to accommodate 24 spokes.
Attach spokes to rim and hub. Fit tube and
tire.
Cut iron tubing to size and buff edges.
Set frame geometry in jig, heat to the
required temperature and fuse with lugs.
bend fork to 1/4" rake. Leave to cool.
Spray paint frame and leave to dry
